bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
changes: In Generation 1, Bulbasaur has a base Special stat of 65.

dex_entries.red: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
dex_entries.blue: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
dex_entries.yellow: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
dex_entries.gold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
dex_entries.silver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
dex_entries.crystal: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.
dex_entries.ruby: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
dex_entries.sapphire: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
dex_entries.emerald: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
dex_entries.firered: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this POKéMON is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
dex_entries.leafgreen: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
dex_entries.diamond: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.pearl: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.platinum: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.heartgold: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
dex_entries.soulsilver: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
dex_entries.black: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.white: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.black2: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.white2: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.x: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
dex_entries.y: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
dex_entries.omegaruby: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
dex_entries.alphasapphire: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
dex_entries.letsgopikachu: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
dex_entries.letsgoeevee: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.
dex_entries.sword: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
dex_entries.shield: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
changes: In Generation 1, Ivysaur has a base Special stat of 80.
In Generations 1-4, Ivysaur has a base experience yield of 141.

dex_entries.red: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
dex_entries.blue: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
dex_entries.yellow: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.
dex_entries.gold: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
dex_entries.silver: If the bud on its back starts to smell sweet, it is evidence that the large flower will soon bloom.
dex_entries.crystal: The bulb on its back grows as it absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off a pleasant aroma when it blooms.
dex_entries.ruby: There is a bud on this POKéMON’s back. To support its weight, IVYSAUR’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
dex_entries.sapphire: There is a bud on this POKéMON’s back. To support its weight, IVYSAUR’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
dex_entries.firered: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
dex_entries.leafgreen: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
dex_entries.emerald: To support its bulb, IVYSAUR’s legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
dex_entries.diamond: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.pearl: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.platinum: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.heartgold: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
dex_entries.soulsilver: If the bud on its back starts to smell sweet, it is evidence that the large flower will soon bloom.
dex_entries.black: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.white: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.black2: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.white2: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.x: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
dex_entries.y: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
dex_entries.omegaruby: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
dex_entries.alphasapphire: There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight, Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
dex_entries.letsgopikachu: The bud on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.
dex_entries.letsgoeevee: The bud on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.
dex_entries.sword: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
dex_entries.shield: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

venusaur.name: Venusaur
changes: In Generation 1, Venusaur has a base Special stat of 100.
In Generations 1-4, Venusaur has a base experience yield of 208.

dex_entries.red: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
dex_entries.blue: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
dex_entries.yellow: The flower on its back catches the sun’s rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.
dex_entries.gold: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.
dex_entries.silver: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.
dex_entries.crystal: As it warms itself and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.
dex_entries.ruby: There is a large flower on VENUSAUR’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
dex_entries.sapphire: There is a large flower on VENUSAUR’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
dex_entries.firered: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
dex_entries.leafgreen: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
dex_entries.emerald: VENUSAUR’s flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
dex_entries.diamond: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.pearl: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.platinum: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.heartgold: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.
dex_entries.soulsilver: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.
dex_entries.black: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.white: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.black2: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.white2: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.x: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.
dex_entries.y: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
dex_entries.omegaruby: There is a large flower on Venusaur’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
dex_entries.alphasapphire: There is a large flower on Venusaur’s back. The flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
dex_entries.letsgopikachu: The flower on its back catches the sun’s rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.
dex_entries.letsgoeevee: The flower on its back catches the sun’s rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.
dex_entries.sword: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
dex_entries.shield: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

name_origin.venus: from Venus Flytrap, a meat-eating plant
